RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 1M Turf CR: 53. Maiden Claiming Purse 15000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HIGHWAY SIXTY ONE outrun in the early going toward the inside, moved closer after a half in the two path, came three wide for the drive when continuing a steady advance, collared the leader inside the furlong grounds and drew clear late under continued pressured handling. PAYTON'S INDIAN settled off the early pace, advanced far turn, took over into the lane, briefly clear a furlong out, could not contain the winner, clearly second best. SWEETASBAILY assumed command after the start, clear before a quarter, extended that advantage up the backstretch while avoiding several geese, continued to hold a daylight advantage through the second turn, began to weaken when headed by the runner up into the straight. EASY ACES broke back, a bit keen off the inside into the first turn, improved position the third quarter with some mild interest, flattened out the final quarter. SEEMYVALENTINE chased the leader for five furlongs and weakened gradually. UNION GRAD broke back after being bothered slightly at the break, void of any early foot, picked off a couple of faltering rivals after the issue had been decided. DIVERGENCE in mid pack early off the inside, had nothing for the drive. BON CHANCE BET forwardly placed early, stopped, well back. SILVER MAID refused at the start.

ENTRY.NAME: Highway Sixty One
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun early, closer after a half, 3w into lane, bid,redged clea

ENTRY.NAME: Seemyvalentine
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Sweetasbaily
ENTRY.COMMENT: assumed command after start, clear, larger lead, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Union Grad
ENTRY.COMMENT: slight bother, broke back, passed couple of tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Payton's Indian
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace, took over, clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Bon Chance Bet
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed early, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Silver Maid
ENTRY.COMMENT: refused

ENTRY.NAME: Divergence
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack early off rail, nothing for drive

ENTRY.NAME: Easy Aces
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, bit keen early, improved position

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 93. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 18000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $10,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 30, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 30, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOLDEN PALACE in the second flight up the backstretch while three wide and between horses, advanced into contention while remaining in the three path through the turn, challenged when straightened for home, drew clear under steady handling. LIKEN IT very reluctant to load, retacked, broke with main group and outward, four wide advance turn, bid, no match late, held the place. WIN YA WIN came in just after the start, raced inside the top two up the backstretch closest to the inside, picked off a tiring rival in the two path turning into the stretch, split foes with less than a furlong remaining when rallying, getting to the runner up late. CHAPEL BARN forwardly placed, advanced to lodge a bid late in the turn, briefly dueled into the stretch and began to weaken soon after. SCHNELL floated out by the winner at the break, fell back to trail, 5w into lane, improved position down the middle of the strip while finding best stride too late. B W P SPECIAL remained back in mid pack in lacking a closing response. IN THE ARCH floated out then clipped heels just after the start, remained back in failing to rally. FAREWELL TIME pressed the issue early off the inside, lodged a brief bid and dueled late in the turn, gave way through the stretch. THE FIVE B'S broke out carrying IN THE ARCH out, was straightened to flash brief speed along the inside, stopped late in the turn. FOLLOWING A STEWARDS' INQUIRY REGARDING THE START, NO ACTION WAS TAKEN.

ENTRY.NAME: The Five B's
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald Deville Carl J and Our Blue Streaks Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, flashed brief speed inside, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: In the Arch
ENTRY.COMMENT: floated out, clipped heels just after start, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Win Ya Win
ENTRY.COMMENT: came in after start, 2p into lane, split foes, gaining 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Chapel Barn
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, bid late turn, dueled into lane, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Farewell Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed, bid late turn, dueled, gave way drive

ENTRY.NAME: B W P Special
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back in lacking a closing response

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Palace
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight 3w and btwn, advanced turn, bid, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Liken It
ENTRY.COMMENT: very reluctant to load, 4w advance, held 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Schnell
ENTRY.COMMENT: floated out break, void of speed, 5w, belated interest

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 5F Turf CR: 72. Maiden Special Weight Purse 30000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: YAMIL broke outwardly and slowly, raced back early as a result, began to advance into the turn, lodged a late surge up the inside to be in time. JOSIE'S PRIORITY away in good order, showed the way early along the inside, dueled into the lane then shook that foe off to be a clear a furlong out, could not contain the winner while outside that one at the wire. GROSSE TETE IAN broke sharp, behind the first flight off the inside, was four wide turning for home, set down, closing the gap on the runner up late. CHARLIE'S PARADE pressed the issue early from the outside,advanced and dueled with the runner up into the lane, could not keep up the final furlong, continued to weaken to lose a couple of more positions late. INGLIS forwardly placed for three furlongs,faltered in the drive. VALENTIN C broke back and was never a threat. A BRAVE RIDE also failed to become involved.

ENTRY.NAME: Josie's Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace inside, shook clear, nailed late

ENTRY.NAME: Inglis
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward for three furlongs, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: A Brave Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to get involved

ENTRY.NAME: Valentin C
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Grosse Tete Ian
ENTRY.OWNER: 5G Farms LLC and McBride Thoroughbreds LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: brak sharp,behind the first flight, 4w into lane,closing gap late

ENTRY.NAME: Charlie's Parade
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed, dueled late turn, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Yamil
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out and slowly, advanced, late surge up rail

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 5F Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GEAUX SUGAR broke on top, cleared soon after, maintained a comfortable advantage through the turn, drew out steadily through the lane while being kept to task. BARAHIN back off the pace and the inside, three to four wide through the turn, roused for the drive, rallied well out in the strip to be in time for the place, not a threat to the winner. ADIEU ACES broke out, was straightened to race in the second flight outside, chased the winner three wide into the stretch, also proved no match for that one, caught late for the place. ONE TOUGH CHARLIE one paced throughout in lacking a closing kick, outfinished for the show. SMART ANALYSIS failed to menace while racing off the inside. FLASHY BOY chased the winner for three furlongs toward the inside and gave way. NOCOMET void of early foot, five wide exiting the turn, failed to produce a rally. BYATHREAD tired while saving ground to no avail.

ENTRY.NAME: Flashy Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased for three furlongs, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Byathread
ENTRY.COMMENT: tired while saving ground

ENTRY.NAME: Smart Analysis
ENTRY.COMMENT: did not menace off the inside

ENTRY.NAME: One Tough Charlie
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced throughout, not enough 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Barahin
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, 3-4w turn, rallied 2nd outside, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Nocomet
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of early foot, 5w into lane,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Geaux Sugar
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, cleared soon after, drew off stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Adieu Aces
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, 2nd flight outside, chased, caught 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 7F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LET'S GO RANDOM lacked speed while between foes for a half, angled out to be four wide turning into the stretch, set down, rallied while remaining well out in the strip to be up in time. SILVER CHALICE forwardly placed in the run up the backstretch while outside, challenged turn, between rivals into the lane, shrugged off his closest rival inside the furlong marker, continued to lead late, caught in the final strides. OUT MAKING TREBLE lacked speed out in the strip, shuffled back late backstretch, moved out and raced four wide through the turn, came five wide for the drive, staged a mild rally to annex the show. CALLEN FEELS GOOD in the second flight off the inside, three wide when under pressure into the lane, angled to the inside, finished up flatly along the rail. BIG BROTHER void of early speed, lodged a good move three wide through the turn to reach contention, lodged a bid outside the runner up into the lane then faltered the final furlong. CATINANDSCATIN pressed the leader early while between horses, fell back through the turn, four wide into the stretch, went evenly to the wire. COASTAL CHAOS forwardly placed out of the chute and up the backstretch, in some traffic early in the turn, lost position then had little for the drive. CLEVER PRINCE was never a serious threat. MR. SNOWFLAKE broke alertly, set the pace for a half then stopped when headed in the turn. SASSI ASPEN off a step slow then trailed well back throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Clever Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: was never a serious threat

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Snowflake
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed, stopped when headed

ENTRY.NAME: Sassi Aspen
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, trailed well back

ENTRY.NAME: Coastal Chaos
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed early, traffic 3/8, empty drive

ENTRY.NAME: Let's Go Random
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed btwn foes, angled 4w into lane, late rally, up

ENTRY.NAME: Catinandscatin
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early off the inside btwn foes, fell back turn, even str

ENTRY.NAME: Out Making Treble
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, shuffled 1/2,moved four wide, mild rally

ENTRY.NAME: Big Brother
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, good gain turn, bid, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Callen Feels Good
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, 3w into lane, angled in, flat late

ENTRY.NAME: Silver Chalice
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward and outside,took over btwn,shook off foe, led late,nailed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 5F Turf CR: 94. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 32000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $15,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 30, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPECTROLITE took command from along the inside soon after the start, clear into the turn, maintained a daylight advantage through the turn and into the stretch, remained clear until late, enough left to hold off the runner up outside at the one at the end, vanned off. HALF FULL back off the pace inside, continued to save ground into the lane, cut the corner, late rally up the inside, rapidly getting to the winner late, missed. HAIL STATE void of speed for three furlongs, came three wide out of the turn, rallied out in the course belatedly to be in time for the show. INDIA INK closest to the winner for three furlongs, weakened gradually, caught late for the show. ELUSIVE WAR forwardly placed up the backstretch in the three path, had little left for the stretch run. MY MAN LOUIE last to leave, never menaced. RELIC HUNTER in the second group outside, four wide into the turn, was giving way when three wide exiting, continued to weaken stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Spectrolite
ENTRY.COMMENT: took command after start, clear until late, lasted

ENTRY.NAME: Half Full
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace inside, cut corner, coming late inside

ENTRY.NAME: My Man Louie
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, lacked speed, did not menace

ENTRY.NAME: India Ink
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased,caught late show

ENTRY.NAME: Elusive War
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, little left stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Hail State
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, 3w into lane, belated rally

ENTRY.NAME: Relic Hunter
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight 4w 3/8, gave way

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 5F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CUSTOM GUITAR within striking distance off the inside early, three to four wide out of the turn when idling, outside bid past the furlong marker, roused, drove clear. SUMMER IS HOT lacked early foot in the two path, inside of traffic late in the turn, moved out a bit for room, challenged between horses past the furlong marker, could not match the winner late, edging away for the place. SUNSHINE STAR forwardly placed outside, four wide into the turn, challenged three wide entering the stretch, could not keep up with the top two late, remained clear of the others. MAGGIE'S RETURN chased the leader for three furlongs off the inside, weakened through the stretch. A P HUMOR broke back, lacked speed outside, was five wide out of the turn, picked off a rival or two to improve position slightly, no real threat down the middle of the strip. ENOUGH HEART broke in good order, cleared to the inside when clear, continued to show the way through the turn and into upper stretch, caved in the final furlong along the inside. TRUE RED SLEW remained back in failing to menace. CATALINA QUEEN off slow, sluggish in trailing throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Catalina Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, sluggish, trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: True Red Slew
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back in failing to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Maggie's Return
ENTRY.OWNER: Haas Margaret Lanetta and Womack Larry D
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased off rail, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Summer Is Hot
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, inside traffic 1/4, bid btwn, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Custom Guitar
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, 3-4w into lane, outside bid, best

ENTRY.NAME: A P Humor
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, 5w into lane, improved bit

ENTRY.NAME: Sunshine Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, 4w into turn, vied, outkicked by top two

ENTRY.NAME: Enough Heart
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in good order, cleared, caved final furlong

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 77. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 35000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $50,000 WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACE. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5 0,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VETERANS DAY never far back up the backstretch while three wide, moved to challenge between horses in the turn, vied past the furlong marker, found more late in digging to narrowly prevail. COMANCHE WARRIOR in the second flight outside the winner, moved with that one while four wide challenge through the turn, held a narrow advantage past the furlong marker, outgamed in the late going while prevailing for the place. MO CREDO lacked early foot outside, four wide through the turn when beginning to advance, continued to rally well out in the strip, coming late to close the gap on the top two. ZINGING BAYOU broke on top, dueled up front while closest to the inside, continued to be one of four vying through upper stretch, weakened gradually the final furlong, caught late for the show. MANLY DEEDS also away well, alternated up front in the two path, vied between horses and inside the winner into and through upper stretch and also faltered in the late going. THE BOSS SOSS back off the pace, raced in the two path through the turn, displayed a mild amount of late interest without posing a serious threat. CASH HOLIDAY devoid of early foot after breaking back, passed a few tiring rivals while also not a serious factor. CATCHIN DRAMA last away, moved up to race in mid pack, faded through the stretch. Z'S GUITAR in the main body early, was finished before a half. SKIPPA forwardly placed early, steadily faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Skippa
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward early, steady retreat

ENTRY.NAME: Z's Guitar
ENTRY.COMMENT: main body, finished before a half

ENTRY.NAME: Zinging Bayou
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled up front closest to the inside, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Cash Holiday
ENTRY.OWNER: Sebastian J Ronald and Sebastian Linda P
ENTRY.COMMENT: devoid of early foot, passed tiring foes

ENTRY.NAME: The Boss Soss
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, mild late interest

ENTRY.NAME: Catchin Drama
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, moved up to mid pack, faded stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Mo Credo
ENTRY.OWNER: Thompson Racing LLC (Stephen Thompson) and OM Racing Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot, four wide turn, rallied, coming late

ENTRY.NAME: Manly Deeds
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2p, weakened btwn foes

ENTRY.NAME: Veterans Day
ENTRY.OWNER: World War IV Racing and Rebel Tide Racing, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back 3w, challenged turn, long drive, found more late

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: World War IV Racing & Rebel TideRacing LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Comanche Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight outside, closer 4w turn, led furlong out,outgamed late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 7F Dirt CR: 53. Maiden Claiming Purse 12000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ADMIRAL AFLEET lacked early speed out in the strip, made a nice move four wide into contention through the turn, took over nearing the furlong marker, edged clear then held the runner up safe late. ONE MORE SLEEP in the second flight off the inside, three wide into the lane, shifted out in mid stretch, finished up willingly. CHIPEEE in mid pack off the inside, three wide move turn, bid bid between, weakened late. BOSS MAN ZONG in the main group off the inside, four wide into the lane, improved a bit without posing a serious threat. HALF CRAZY forwardly placed, bid turn, led upper, faltered final furlong. MIDGE'S TIME broke back, lacked speed, five wide out of the turn when improving, began to flatten out in midstretch. GOLDEN CONFUSION broke out, was straightened to race in the second flight, fell back a bit through the turn and came up empty for the drive. MINE YOUR BIZ vied up front while between horses for four furlongs and began to give way. WILD FIST last to leave, trailed early, improved by passing tiring rivals, not a threat. RUNAWAY JIM moved up to vie up front closest to the inside, stopped after a half. CREOLE REB was never involved. LAMONT was finished early, trailed home.

ENTRY.NAME: Runaway Jim
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed inside, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Confusion
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, straightened, 2nd flight earlyt, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Wild Fist
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed, passed tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: One More Sleep
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, 3w into lane, shifted out, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Boss Man Zong
ENTRY.COMMENT: main group, 4w into lane, improved bit

ENTRY.NAME: Mine Your Biz
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for a half between horses, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Creole Reb
ENTRY.COMMENT: was never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Chipeee
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack off rail, closer late turn, bid stretch, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Half Crazy
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward, bid, led upper, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Midge's Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, 5w into lane, improved, flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Admiral Afleet
ENTRY.COMMENT: back early, outside advance, 4w into lane, took over, edged clr

ENTRY.NAME: Lamont
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early, trailed
